shopping_list.title: Shopping List

remove_task_popup.title: Are you sure?

clear_tasks_popup.title: Are you sure?
clear_tasks_popup.content: You want to remove all done tasks :)

add_all_tasks_popup.content: You want to mark all tasks as done.

reset_password.title: Password Reset
reset_password.text: Enter your email address to request a password reset..

verify_email.title: Thank you for registering!
verify_email.verify: We sent a confirmation email to:
verify_email.check: Please check your email and click on the link to verify your email address
verify_email.signin_message: Do you already have an account?

about.title: About Us
about.description:
The application is designed to streamline the process of planning the completion of specific tasks, e.g. shopping lists.
It is possible to efficiently manage the task list, add, delete and mark completed tasks.

shopping_list.add_task_success: Done! Task {{task}} was added to the list
shopping_list.add_task_failure: Ups! Something went wrong while adding data with message: {{errorMessage}}
shopping_list.remove_task_success: Done! Task {{task}} was removed from the list
shopping_list.remove_task_failure: Ups! Something went wrong while removing data with message: {{errorMessage}}
shopping_list.task_to_done_success: Done! Task {{task}} was successfully added to done list.
shopping_list.task_to_done_failure: Ups! Something went wrong while updating data with message: {{errorMessage}}
shopping_list.task_to_todo_success: Done! Task {{task}} was successfully returned to the task list.
shopping_list.task_to_todo_failure: Ups! Something went wrong while updating data with message: {{errorMessage}}
shopping_list.add_all_tasks_success: Done! All tasks were added to the list
shopping_list.add_all_tasks_failue: Ups! Something went wrong while adding data with message: {{errorMessage}}
shopping_list.remove_all_tasks_success: Done! All tasks were removed from the list
shopping_list.remove_all_tasks_failue: Ups! Something went wrong while removing data with message: {{errorMessage}}
